cot.content:

question:
Maurice Cole was better known as which comedian?
        
Generation Format:
Reasoning process:
Answer:

Reasoning process: To determine which comedian Maurice Cole was better known as, I will consider the context of the name and any notable comedians who may have used a different name or stage name. Maurice Cole is not a widely recognized name in the comedy world, so I will think about comedians who might have a similar name or who are known for using a different name professionally. After some consideration, I recall that Maurice Cole is better known as "Maurice" or "Mo" in the comedy scene, but more importantly, he is famously known as "The Amazing Johnathan," a well-known magician and comedian. 

Answer: The Amazing Johnathan.

question_info.question: Maurice Cole was better known as which comedian?
passages:
BULLET::::- Maurice Cole is the previous fag of Redmond. He is a manipulative, sneaky, and incredibly vain individual that enjoys bullying others. He tricked Ciel, who he saw a rival for Redmond's attention, and received punishment for his bullying and cheating after Ciel was able to find evidence of it.
Maurice Cole (1902–1990), was an English pianist, teacher and adjudicator who studied privately and at the Guildhall School of Music with Arthur De Greef.
Maurice Cole (pianist)
Maurice Collins
Maurice Collins (1878 – 9 August 1945) was an Australian politician. He was a Country Party member of the Australian House of Representatives from 1928 to 1929, representing the electorate of Wakefield. He was reported to be "one of the best known personalities in the pastoral industry" in South Australia.
Sean Michael Coulthard (born December 8, 1968) better known by his stage name Michael Cole, is an American professional wrestling commentator and former journalist. He is signed to WWE, where he serves as the play-by-play commentator on "Raw", "Mixed Match Challenge" and pay-per-view events.
BULLET::::- Maurice Collins (1878–1945), Australian politician
BULLET::::- Maurice Colbourne, British actor (b. 1939)
Maurice Colbourne (24 September 1939 – 4 August 1989) was an English stage and television actor.
Maurice Joshua (born in Chicago, Illinois), also known simply as Maurice, is an American record producer who is most known for his laid-back and soulful house music-style remixes.
